pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, February 4, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the third floor foyer of West Block as of 12:00 p.m.

3:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Ukrainian filmmaker Oleg Sentsov.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 2:45 p.m.

4:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the leadership of Dairy Farmers of Canada. Minister of Agriculture and Agri-Food Marie-Claude Bibeau will be in attendance.

Closed to media.

5:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Edmonton, Don Iveson.

Closed to media.
